```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(ggfortify)
library(cluster)
library(ConsensusClusterPlus)

log_tpm_counts <- fread("fixed_logged_normalized_counts.csv")

```


```{r}
# creating redundant dataset to make changes to
plusvar_log_tpm_counts <- log_tpm_counts

# adding variance as a column so we can grab our datasets for clustering
plusvar_log_tpm_counts$var <- apply(plusvar_log_tpm_counts[, 2:57], MARGIN=1, FUN=var, na.rm=TRUE)

# ordering by highest variance first
plusvar_log_tpm_counts <- plusvar_log_tpm_counts[order(-var)]

# breaking data into smaller sets for individual clustering
ten_log_tpm_counts <- plusvar_log_tpm_counts[1:10,1:57]
hundred_log_tpm_counts <- plusvar_log_tpm_counts[1:100,1:57]
onek_log_tpm_counts <- plusvar_log_tpm_counts[1:1000,1:57]
fivek_log_tpm_counts <- plusvar_log_tpm_counts[1:5000,1:57]
tenk_log_tpm_counts <- plusvar_log_tpm_counts[1:10000,1:57]
```

```{r}
# PAM Sankey Diagram
library(ggalluvial)
metadata <- fread("GSE207751_PBMC_metadata.csv")
tenClust <- data.table(ten_pamResults$clustering)
hunClust <- data.table(hundred_pamResults$clustering)
onekClust <- data.table(onek_pamResults$clustering)
fivekClust <- data.table(fivek_pamResults$clustering)
tenkClust <- data.table(tenk_pamResults$clustering)
clustInfo <- data.table(colnames(fivek_log_tpm_counts))
colnames(clustInfo)[1] = "samples"
clustInfo$ten <- tenClust
clustInfo$hundred <- hunClust
clustInfo$onek <- onekClust
clustInfo$fivek <- fivekClust
clustInfo$tenk <- tenkClust
clustInfo <- clustInfo[-1,]
clustInfo$metadata <- metadata[,6]

# PAM Sankey
ggplot(clustInfo,
     aes(axis2 = ten, axis3 = hundred, axis4 = onek, axis5= fivek, axis6 = tenk)) +
  geom_alluvium(aes(fill = metadata), color = "black", width = 1/2, show.legend = TRUE) +
  geom_stratum(width = 1/2, fill = "blue", color = "grey") +
  geom_stratum(width = 1/2, fill = "lightgray", color = "black") +
  geom_label(stat = "stratum", aes(label = after_stat(stratum))) +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = c("ten", "hundred", "onek", "fivek", "tenk"), expand = c(.05, .05)) +
  ggtitle("Sample Clustering Based on # of Variables")
```

```{r}
tpm_norm_counts <- fread("fixed_logged_normalized_counts.csv")
tpm_norm_counts$variance <- apply(tpm_norm_counts[, 2:57], MARGIN= 1, FUN=var) # Variance of just the data rows as rows
tpm_norm_counts <- tpm_norm_counts[order(-variance)] #Order by variance descending
genes_by_variance <- tpm_norm_counts$hgnc_symbol #Make a list of genes ordered by variance
top_5000_genes <- genes_by_variance[1:5000] # The top 5000 genes in the list remove variance row so that it isn't treated as an extra data point
seed_val <- runif(1, min = 0.01 , max = 2^31) # For completeness all runs with different gene amounts will use the same seed_val
```

```{r}
top_10_counts_data <- as.data.frame(tpm_norm_counts[1:10, !"variance", with=FALSE]) %>% tibble::column_to_rownames("hgnc_symbol") %>% as.matrix 
results_10 <- ConsensusClusterPlus(top_10_counts_data, maxK=20, reps=1000, pItem=0.8, pFeature = 1, title="Top 10 Genes", clusterAlg = "hc", distance = "pearson", seed = seed_val, plot = "svg")
```

```{r}
                          c("Samples", "10 Genes", "100 Genes", "1000 Genes", "5000 Genes", "10000 Genes")) %>% column_to_rownames("Samples")
alluvial_data$unique <- paste(as.character(alluvial_data$`10 Genes`), as.character(alluvial_data$`100 Genes`), as.character(alluvial_data$`1000 Genes`), as.character(alluvial_data$`5000 Genes`), as.character(alluvial_data$`10000 Genes`))
freqs <- table(alluvial_data$unique)
alluvial_data <- distinct(alluvial_data)
alluvial_data$`Sample Frequency` <- freqs[alluvial_data$unique]
alluvial_data <- subset(alluvial_data, select = -unique)
rownames(alluvial_data) <- NULL
lodes_data <- to_lodes_form(alluvial_data, axes= 1:5, key = "Amount of Genes Used", value = "Cluster")
ggplot(lodes_data, aes(y = `Sample Frequency`, x = `Amount of Genes Used`, stratum = `Cluster`, alluvium = alluvium, fill = `Cluster`, label = `Cluster`)) + scale_fill_brewer(type = "qual", palette = "Set3") + geom_flow(stat = "alluvium", lode.guidance = "frontback", color = "darkgrey") + geom_stratum() +  scale_y_continuous(name = "Sample Frequency", limits =c(0, 57)) + ggtitle("ConsensusClusterPlus by Amount of Variable Genes Used (k=10)")
```

```{r}
# Chi Square for PAM compared to Metadata
metaCondensed <- metadata[,-c(2:5)]
metaCondensed$condition[metaCondensed$condition=="ast"] <- 1 
metaCondensed$condition[metaCondensed$condition=="healthy"] <- 2
chiSqData <- metaCondensed
chiSqData$PAM = clustInfo[,5]
summaryPAM <- chisq.test(table(chiSqData$condition,chiSqData$PAM))
statTestResults <- data.table()
statTestResults$PAM = data.table(c("p-value"=summaryPAM$p.value, "p-adj"=p.adjust(summaryPAM$p.value, n=2)))

# Chi Square for K-Means compared to Metadata
chiSqData$KMeans = kclustInfo[,4]
summaryKMEANS <- chisq.test(table(chiSqData$condition,chiSqData$KMeans))
#p.adjust(summaryKMEANS$p.value, n=2) # dependent (p low reject Ho)
statTestResults$KMEANS = data.table(c("p-value"=summaryKMEANS$p.value, "p-adj"=p.adjust(summaryKMEANS$p.value, n=2)))

# Chi Square for ConsensusClusterPlus to Metadata
chiSqData$Consensus = c(results_5000[[10]]$consensusClass[1:56])
summaryCONSENSUS <- chisq.test(table(chiSqData$condition, chiSqData$Consensus))
statTestResults$CONSENSUS = data.table(c("p-value"=summaryCONSENSUS$p.value, "p-adj"=p.adjust(summaryCONSENSUS$p.value, n=2)))

# Chi Square for PAM to Consensus
summaryPAMCON <- chisq.test(table(chiSqData$PAM, chiSqData$Consensus))
statTestResults$PAMCON = data.table(c("p-value"=summaryPAMCON$p.value, "p-adj"=p.adjust(summaryPAMCON$p.value, n=2)))

# Chi Square for PAM to K-Means
summaryPAMK <- chisq.test(table(chiSqData$PAM, chiSqData$KMeans))
statTestResults$PAMK = data.table(c("p-value"=summaryPAMK$p.value, "p-adj"=p.adjust(summaryPAMK$p.value, n=2)))

# Chi Square for K-Means to Consensus
summaryKCON <- chisq.test(table(chiSqData$KMeans, chiSqData$Consensus))
statTestResults$KCON = data.table(c("p-value"=summaryKCON$p.value, "p-adj"=p.adjust(summaryKCON$p.value, n=2)))

# Chi Square for All Clustering to Metadata
summaryALL <- chisq.test(table(chiSqData$condition, chiSqData$PAM, chiSqData$KMeans, chiSqData$Consensus))
statTestResults$ALL = data.table(c("p-value"=summaryALL$p.value, "p-adj"=p.adjust(summaryALL$p.value, n=4)))

```
